import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faCoffee, faCalendar, faClock, faTimes, faTrash, } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; const AddBooking = () => { const [fromTime, setFromTime] = useState("09:00"); // Ajout de 1 heure par défaut const [toTime, setToTime] = useState("10:00"); // Ajout de 1 heure par défaut // Handler functions to update state when inputs change const handleFromChange = (e) => { setFromTime(e.target.value); }; const handleToChange = (e) => { setToTime(e.target.value); }; // Function to calculate the difference between 'from' and 'to' times const calculateTimeDifference = () => { // Convert time strings to Date objects for easier calculation const from = new Date(`2000-01-01T${fromTime}`); const to = new Date(`2000-01-01T${toTime}`); // Calculate the time difference in milliseconds const difference = Math.abs(to - from); // Convert milliseconds to hours and minutes const hours = Math.floor(difference / 3600000); const minutes = Math.floor((difference % 3600000) / 60000); return `${hours}h ${minutes}m`; }; return ( <>
